data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_2
data.value: [NEW] Fillers. Space between lines can be filled in to indicate the areas prohibited for stopping or driving. 3 styles are available: Lines, Grid and Solid Fill. To create hold Alt. [NEW] Stop lines. It is now possible to connect two points on the same road to create a stop line. 2 available styles: "Solid" and "Dashed". [NEW] New line style: "Solid & Dashed". [NEW] Lines and templates in the list now have icons that show style and colour. [NEW] Markings will be now copied when the road is copied with MoveIt (function will not become available until MoveIt mod is updated). [NEW] Added Copy and Paste options for line colour. [UPDATED] Upgrading the road to a different road with the same amount of lanes will now preserve the markings. [NEW] Line segment with the rule will be highlighted when hovering over the edit panel of that rule. [TRANSLATION] Added Simplified Chinese translation.

data.name: Tool_InfoDeleteStopLine
data.value: クリックして停止線を削除

data.name: Tool_InfoCreateStopLine
data.value: クリックして停止線を追加

data.name: Tool_InfoFillerClickStart
data.value: このポイントから塗り潰しを開始

data.name: Tool_InfoFillerClickEnd
data.value: 終点(開始)のポイントを選択して、塗り潰しを作成

data.name: Tool_InfoFillerClickNext
data.value: このポイントを選択して、次のポイントへ移動

data.name: Tool_InfoFillerSelectStart
data.value: 塗り潰し開始のポイントを選択

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_2_1
data.value: [FIXED] Fix hold Alt, Ctrl and Shift buttons on Mac OS and Linux. [NEW] Added "Double solid" and "Double Dashed" stop line styles. [TRANSLATION] Added Italian and Portuguese translations.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_1
data.value: [UPDATED] "What`s New" message will pop-up one time after an update and can be disabled in the Options menu. [TRANSLATION] Added the following translations: Czech, Dutch, French, German, Japanese, Polish, Russian, and Spanish. [NEW] End Points can now be dragged from one to another by holding Ctrl. [NEW] Backups - In the Options menu the marking data on a map can now be backed up by dumping to a file and then importing it. This is necessary if you need to disable the mod, make a new save without the mod, and then need to recovery all markings. [NEW] There will now be a popup warning when deleting items. This applies to lines, rules and templates. This can be disabled in the options. [NEW] New shortcut added for adding a new rule - Shift+Ctrl+A (remappable). [NEW] Quick Rule setup: After adding a new rule the interface for selecting its start and end points now opens automatically. You no longer need to click the "From" and "To" areas. This can be disabled in the options. [FIXED] Fixed issue with lines appearing to be broken or split - only occurred at highway and city road transitions. [UPDATED] Lines will no longer render when Info View overlays are shown. [UPDATED] Activation shortcut will now trigger when another tool opens while Marking Tool is already opened.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_3
data.value: [NEW] Added new filler style - Chevron (<<<<<). [NEW] Added crosswalks. Hold Shift to create them. Currently available Styles: "Existing crosswalk", "Zebra", "Double Zebra", "Parallel solid lines", "Parallel dashed lines", "Ladder", "Solid". [NEW] Added perpendicular lines. These lines don't have second point, they are generated as a straight line from one point. To create perpendicular line, pull the line in the opposite direction from the intersection. [NEW] Added the ability to copy/paste style of lines, fillers, and crosswalks. [NEW] Added ability to sort lines and templates by styles and types. You can modify and disable the function in the settings. [UPDATED] Updated template selection menu. [NEW] Added grouping of nearby points for easier selection. There are two types of grouping available: in a circle and in a line. You can pick the type or disable the function in the settings. [NEW] Added indication of conflicting rules. [NEW] Added the ability to center a solid line in the "Solid & Dashed" style. [UPDATED] Changed how to begin editing a point. Now you need to click on the point while holding Ctrl. [NEW] Added the ability to select tool's language different from the game language. [TRANSLATION] Added Finnish translation.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_4
data.value: [WARNING] Default templates setting will be reset. [NEW] Added the ability to copy/paste marking from one exist intersection to another exist intersection. [UPDATED] Now the marking is not removed if you replace the road with a different number of points. [NEW] Added map editor support. [NEW] Added the ability to save marking data in intersection assets. [NEW] Added "Shark teeth" line and stop line style. [NEW] Added "Solid&Dashed" stop line style. [NEW] Added "Chess board" crosswalk style. [NEW] Added the ability to set create modifiers for any styles. [NEW] Added the ability to duplicate templates. [NEW] Added the ability to have several templates with some name. [NEW] Added Alignment option to all double line styles. [NEW] Added the ability to start filler "Chevron" style from edges. [NEW] Added the ability to get delete warning only if will affect others items. [NEW] Added the ability to resize panel. [NEW] Added the ability to backup templates. [NEW] Added the ability to reset all points offset. [NEW] Added MoveIt mirroring support (wait MoveIt update). [UPDATED] Update filler "Chevron" style calculation algorithm. [FIXED] Fix filler vertex duplicates in create interface. [FIXED] Fix asym lines wrong invert value after load.

data.name: MessageBox_CantUndone
data.value: この操作は元に戻せません！！

data.name: Settings_RailUnderMarking

data.name: Settings_RailUnderMarkingWarning
data.value: 警告：このオプションは、ゲーム内の描画順序を変更します

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_4_1
data.value: [NEW] Added the ability to draw marking under tracks. This can be disabled in the options. WARNING: This option change game objects render order. [NEW] Added modifier to create a empty line (without rules). [NEW] Added the ability to create all edge lines at once (line from road last point to next road first point). [NEW] Lines no longer climb on pavement. Work only for lines from the first or last road point. [NEW] Added "Quick crosswalk option setup" - automatically open border selection interface after create crosswalk like line's "Quick rule setup". This can be disabled in the options. [NEW] Added panel additional options menu. [FIXED] Fix left mouse click on selection node. [FIXED] Fix panel out of screen. [UPDATED] Hover overlay color changed from white to light blue to avoid merging with the markup. [UPDATED] Crosswalk line no longer creates unnecessary intersections. You may need to set crosswalk borders for already created crosswalks.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_5
data.value: [NEW] Added the ability to save whole intersection marking as preset and after apply to any other intersection. [NEW] Added the ability to save templates and presets as asset and share it over Workshop. [UPDATED] Updated UI and improved UI performance. Reduced delay when switching tabs and selecting items. [UPDATED] Now templates values can be changes only in edit mode, what prevents accidental changes to values. [NEW] Added panel tips (can be disable in settings). [NEW] Added the ability to cut new line by crosswalks (can be disable in settings). [NEW] Added the ability to change color values with mouse wheel. [FIXED] Fix train and monorail roads. [FIXED] Fix and improve points group overlay. [TRANSLATION] Added English-UK translation.

data.value: このタイプは追加ルールをサポートしません。

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_5_1
data.value: [UPDATED] Improve messages about load data errors. [FIXED] Fix and update localizes.

data.name: Mod_LoadFailedAll
data.value: マーキングが正常に描画されず、ロード時にエラーがありました。 全てのマーキングで描画に失敗！！

data.name: FillerEditor_InfoSelectRailSecond

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_5_2
data.value: [UPDATED] Update Harmony dependence: resolving conflicts with others mods that use it

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_5_3
data.value: [FIXED] Fixed a situation where markings could disappear from saving

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_6
data.value: [NEW] Added the ability to make markings on segments. [NEW] Added filler 3D styles: "Pavement" and "Grass". [NEW] Added line 3D style: "Pavement". [NEW] Added the ability follow rails to filler styles "Stripes" and "Chevron". [NEW] Improve performance by added LOD (Level Of Detail) to markings. The LOD distance is set in the settings. [NEW] Added support taxiways. [FIXED] Fixed a conflict with other mods that could cause the tool button to not appear. [FIXED] Fixed a conflict with scroll panel and scroll wheel to change values. [UPDATED] Now there is no difference that you enter a dot or a comma in the properties value field.

data.value: {0} で設定された通り全体に、マーキングを一括で適用しますか？

data.name: Tool_InfoSelectLineEndPointNormal
data.value: 垂直線はポイントの後方へドラッグして作成

data.name: Tool_InfoSelectLineEndPointStop

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_7
data.value: [NEW] New node/segment selection mode. The selection area exactly follows the actual shapes of the nodes and segments that prevents difficulties with selecting too close together nodes. [NEW] Added automatic line creation when create filler. No more need add lines before create filler. [NEW] Added the ability to split point to two virtual points, set split shift and choose lines alignment. Now possible continue one double line with two separating single lines. [NEW] Added style modifier "From clipboard". Hold Ctrl+Alt to apply style from clipboard to new line, rule, crosswalk or filler. [NEW] Added the ability to apply segment marking between two intersections and apply to whole street. [NEW] Added the ability set second color for "Zebra" and "Double zebra" crosswalk styles. [UPDATED] Changed press escape key behavior. Now it's like default game tool behavior. If something is being edited, then press escape will suggest an exit, rather than closing the tool with the loss of changes. [NEW] Added point grouping by road in list (can be disable in settings). [FIXED] Fix line connector overlay position on elevated roads. [FIXED] Fix 3D filler styles calculation. [FIXED] Fix error in copy/paste marking mode that made it impossible to use the tool. [FIXED] Fix reset panel scroll position when resize panel. [UPDATED] Crosswalk mode no more activate by hold shift when change value by scroll wheel. [NEW] Set panel default size by double click on panel resizer.

data.name: LineEditor_LineEndAlignment
data.value: ポイントの終点を位置合わせ

data.name: LineEditor_LineStartAlignment
data.value: ポイントの始点を位置合わせ

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_7_1
data.value: [NEW] Added the ability to set alignment for stop lines. [NEW] Additional templates sort: ---1 - Default templates sorted by type ---2 - Other templates sorted by type then by name ---3 - Other author templates sort by author name then by type then by name [FIXED] Fix load segment presets. [FIXED] Fix default panel size.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_7_2
data.value: [FIXED] Fix 3D fillers height outside available tiles. [FIXED] Fix creating button duplicates.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_7_3
data.value: [NEW] Added missing dependencies checker. [FIXED] Fix 3D fillers height on nodes outside available tiles.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_7_4
data.value: [FIXED] Fixed save and load presets' screenshot. [FIXED] Fixed bug when nodes with marking after loading had a wrong shape. [TRANSLATION] Added Indonesian translation.

data.name: Settings_HideStreetName
data.value: ツール使用時は道路名を非表示

data.name: Tool_InfoSelectCrosswalk
data.value: {0} + クリックで、横断歩道を選択

data.name: Tool_InfoSelectLine
data.value: {0} + クリックで、ラインを選択

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_8
data.value: [NEW] Added selection step over like in MoveIt. Press Ctrl+Space to step over (you can rebind in mod options). [NEW] Added curbs to filler 3D styles. [NEW] Added rounded corners to filler 3D styles. [NEW] Added offset from lines to filler 3D styles. [NEW] Added filler styles: Gravel, Ruined, Cliff. [NEW] Added pavement stop line style. [NEW] Added option "Follow guide lines" for solid filler, so now possible make solid fillers on sloped segments. [NEW] Added the ability to click with Ctrl to select line or crosswalk instend of delete its. [NEW] Added warning for Linux users about missing libraries. [NEW] Added the ability to change style by scroll wheel. [NEW] Added the ability to hide street names while using tool. Can be disabled in mod options. [NEW] Added new icon for UUI button. [FIXED] Fixed select template button icon.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_8_1
data.value: [UPDATED] Buttons on paste mode moved ouside of circle. [TRANSLATION] Added Korean translation.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_8_2
data.value: [NEW] Added discard button after create template/preset. [NEW] Added colored text to tooltips. [NEW] Added the ability to hide original mod button in toolbar If you use UUI mod. [FIXED] Fixed not removed items from list when this items were removed. [FIXED] Fixed line grouping. [TRANSLATION] Added Turkish translation.

data.name: Settings_LevelCrossingUnderMarking
data.value: 踏切下部でマーキングを描画

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_9
data.value: [NEW] Added the ability to save points offset values for each roads. [NEW] Added gap option to zebra and double zebra crosswalk styles. It allows to set different space each N dashes. [NEW] Added intersection points to lines from one splited point with different alignment. [NEW] Added settings of sorting templates, presets and applying list. [NEW] Added template grouping by fit (Perfect/Close/Possible/Poor). [NEW] Added illumination to marking while editing at night. [NEW] Added illumination to cursor like default game tool. [NEW] Added option for placing markings under level crossings. Can be disabled in mod settings. [NEW] Added third (middle) point to taxiways/runways. [FIXED] Fixed error while saving template as asset. [FIXED] Fixed crosswalks calculation error.

data.name: StyleOption_ColorOption
data.value: カラーバリエーション

data.name: StyleOption_AssetNetwork
data.value: ネットワークのアセット

data.name: Settings_AutoApplyPasting
data.value: ソースとターゲットが一致する場合は、マーキングの貼り付けを自動的に適用

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_10
data.value: [NEW] Added Prop and Tree line styles. They allow place any prop or tree on lines. Those objects are not counted in game prop and tree limits. [NEW] Added Decorative network line style. It allows place any decorative network like fence on lines. Those networks are not counted in game node and segment limits. [NEW] Added the ability to use markings on train tracks, metro tracks and pedestrian paths. [NEW] Added auto applying marking when it is pasted from buffer or preset if target intersection matches source intersection. Can be disabled in mod settings. [NEW] Added ability to turn off sidewalk clipping. [NEW] Sidewalk clipping is available for segments. [UPDATED] 3D filler mesh extends below the road surface to prevent gap on slope nodes. [UPDATED] Added the ability to rotate Shark Teeth. [FIXED] Fixed hole in overlay while selection such a big nodes. [FIXED] Fixed shadow on pavement line. [UPDATED] Added number format (m, %, °) to all properties. [FIXED] Fixed missed filler's points on intersection between normal lines. [TRANSLATION] Added Romanian language.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_10_1
data.value: [UPDATED] Auto applying marking is enable only when there is only one posible option to paste marking. [NEW] Added option "Only direct order" and "Direct and invert order" to auto applying marking. [FIXED] Fixed fillers calculation and illumination. [UPDATED] "Default color" button on color selector set default color of style instead of default color of mod.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_10_2
data.value: [UPDATED] Added Plazas & Promenades DLC support. [NEW] Added Loading Screen Mod Revisited support. [FIXED] Fixed UI blinking while searching props/trees/networks.

data.name: Settings_CollapseRules

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_11
data.value: [NEW] Save marking data into network asset and auto apply it when network is placed. [NEW] Added the ability to set markings in tunnels. [NEW] Added Double dashed asym style. [NEW] Added the ability to collapse unnecessary options. [NEW] Added the ability to set tilt and slope to props and trees. [NEW] Added the ability to set auto props step depends on their size. [NEW] Added the ability to set range to props/trees shift and elevation. [NEW] Added the ability to set second color to double lines. [NEW] Props/trees/networks are sorted by name. [NEW] Remember searched text when searching for props/trees/networks. [FIXED] Color of decorative networks which use theme textures. [FIXED] 3D fillers, props, trees and networks which are added by IMT are visible in info views. [FIXED] UI flickering while searching props/trees/networks. [UPDATED] LOD distance can be set for each type of marking separetly. [UPDATED] properties "Offset before" and "Offset after" are combined into "Offset" property. [UPDATED] properties "Dash length" and "Space length" are combined into "Length" property. [UPDATED] properties "Use gap", "Gap length" and "Gap period" are combined into "Gap" property. [UPDATED] properties "Use guides", "Left guide" and "Right guide" are combined into "Guide" property. [UPDATED] properties "Base" and "Height" are combined into "Triangle" property. [UPDATED] properties "Corner radius" and "Median Corner radius" are combined into "Corner radius" property. [UPDATED] properties "Curb size" and "Median curb size" are combined into "Curb size" property.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_12
data.value: [NEW] Added a new line style: Text. It allows to write custom text on road and set any font installed in the system. [NEW] Added the ability to link preset to network asset. It will be auto applied when road is built. [NEW] Added a new line type: Lane. It simplifies the placement props/trees/network/text that should be placed in the middle of lane. [New] Added a new line style: Zigzag. [NEW] Added the ability to save different markings for different types of road elevations (slope, tunnel) in asset editor. [NEW] Auto creation of edge lines of lane. Can be disabled in the mod settings. [NEW] Added distribution option to props/trees. it allows to make prop/tree fixed at the ends of the line and set dynamic space length. [NEW] Added the ability to invert the value of network shift. [NEW] Added shortcuts for the paste marking mode. [UPDATED] It is not needed to hold Ctrl to drag point anymore. Old behavior (with holding Ctrl) can be enabled in the mod settings. [FIXED] Lines and fillers follows sloped segment as much as possible. It may still not be perfect in some cases, but much better then before. [FIXED] Pavement line follows filler properly. [FIXED] Fixed when asym styles values were pasted with wrong invertation. [FIXED] Networks/props/trees that were added by IMT are visible on preset screenshot. [FIXED] Fixed that fillers were not updated after selecting filler guides.

data.name: Header_ExpandTooltip
data.value: {0} を押して、全てのルールを折り畳む/展開

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_13
data.value: [UPDATED] Improved resolution of rendering and shape of 2D fillers and crosswalks. [NEW] Added effects of cracks and voids to all 2D lines, 2D fillers and crosswalks. [NEW] Added texture of material to markings, so that it looks not so flat. [FIXED] Fixed filler offset calculation. [NEW] Added the ability to apply a preset to all segments of network asset. [NEW] Added the ability to collapse line rules. Auto collapsing can be enabled in the mod settings. [NEW] Added property categories. they can be collapsed. [NEW] Added copy/paste option to color property. [NEW] Added the ability to set HEX value of color. [NEW] Added the ability to set style to all rules of line. [NEW] Added the ability to set style to all rules on node/segment with the same style. [NEW] Added the ability to set style to all rules on node/segment. [NEW] Added the ability to apply template to all lines/crosswalks/fillers on node/segment. [NEW] Added the ability to reset style settings to default values. [NEW] Added the ability to select which end of prop/tree style is fixed (both/only start/only end). [NEW] Added the ability to set different shift on to each ends of network. [NEW] Added min max count of props/trees. [NEW] Added the ability to make slope ends of zebra. [NEW] Added the ability to set offset to text. [NEW] Added the ability to set color to network (can affect only certain networks). [NEW] Focus is auto set to search field when prop/tree/network selector opens. [UPDATED] Timeout between panel scrolling and changing value by wheel is increased to 3 second to prevent exidently changing value of property. [UPDATED] Changed priority of applying default marking: ---1. linked preset. ---2. saved in asset data. ---3. data from segment which was replaced. [FIXED] Search field of prop/tree/network selector lost focus when tool panel is closed so that it does not block camera control if tool is closed while searching. [NEW] Added Font search. [FIXED] Properly removing unused texture and meshes to reduce memory usage and prevent memory leaks. [NEW] Added API. Other mods can communicate with IMT. Available as Nuget package www.nuget.org/packages/IMT.API.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_13_1
data.value: [UPDATED] Improved solid filler rendering on slope. [UPDATED] Improved 3D filler offset calculation. [FIXED] Shark teeth marking has wrong alignment. [FIXED] Network line options are not visible. [FIXED] Error that does not allow to save intersection data if grid filler is used. [FIXED] Changed lines and crosswalks render order: they draw on top of other decals. [FIXED] Texture density value does not save. [FIXED] Filler is invisible with certain curb size and radius values. [FIXED] Marking is not visible if OpenGL is used for rendering. [FIXED] Line intersections are not detected in certain cases. [FIXED] Wrong aligment of line that is started from split point after copy/paste marking from one intersection to another.

data.value: 選択したアセットが無い: "{0}"

data.name: StyleOption_ThemeMissed
data.value: 選択したテーマが無い: "{0}"

data.name: FillerStyle_TextureIsland
data.value: カスタムテクスチャの分離帯

data.name: StyleOption_DefaultTheme
data.value: デフォルトのマップテーマ

data.name: Settings_AutoCollapseItemsPanel
data.value: アイテムパネルを自動で折り畳む

data.name: Header_ExpandGroupTooltip
data.value: {0} を押して、全てのグループを折り畳む/展開

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_14
data.value: [UPDATED] Huge update of UI Style. [NEW] Items panel auto hides to save place on panel. Can be disabled in the mod settings. [NEW] Added decal filler: the ability to set any decal as filler texture. [NEW] Added texture island filler: the ability to set any decal as texture of 3D filler. [NEW] Added decal crosswalk: the ability to set any decal as crosswalk texture. [NEW] Added asphalt filler. [NEW] Added the ability to select map theme for grass, gravel, ruined and cliff fillers. [NEW] Added the ability to select pavement/curb theme. [NEW] Added separate style for decals. It provides additional options for decal like tiling and slope tolerance. Decals are still available as props for backward compatibility. [NEW] Trees and networks that were added with IMT are visible from any distance like regular trees and networks. [NEW] Added the ability to set favorite networks/props/trees, they will be shown in the top of list. [NEW] Keep asset name if prop/tree/network is missed: it will not be reset to "not set" and item appear again when asset is back. [UPDATED] Added search to apply template panel. [NEW] Push data of used networks/props/trees to LSM, so that LSM can show missed asset that are used only by IMT. [UPDATED] Added support of multiline text (up to 3 lines). [UPDATED] Hold ALT to change all color components (RGB) simultaneously while scrolling the wheel. [UPDATED] Hold Shift to expand/colapse all groups. [UPDATED] Added option to set random angle to trees and props. [NEW] Added the ability to disable swaying trees in the wind. [UPDATED] Added style icons to rule panel header. [UPDATED] Added icons to all groups. [NEW] Added "invert all chevrons" button to the mod settings. [FIXED] Fixed zigzag "start from" value does not save. [FIXED] Fixed that shortcuts for turning/mirroring marking do not work while pasting marking.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_14_1
data.value: [UPDATED] Polishing new UI. [FIXED] Scrolling wheel over dropdown does not change dropdown value. [FIXED] Dropdown popups can not be closed. [FIXED] Error while rendering some networks and fillers. [FIXED] Props/trees/networks do not follow segment properly. [FIXED] Decal does not save color settings.

data.name: Mod_WhatsNewMessage1_14_2
data.value: [UPDATED] Added Hotels&Retreats DLC support. [TRANSLATION] Added Brazilian translation.

data.name: Settings_RecalculateMarkings
data.value: 全てのマーキングを再計算
